ProjectTitle: Role of virus-derived DNA synthesis in the amplification of insect antiviral signals
InitialFeedbackHistory:
07/07/2022
Do you already know which data repository you might use? Would any of the EBI repositories (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/) be suitable? ENA also gives checklists for reporting, please take a look if any of these may be a useful metadata standard for your work: www.ebi.ac.uk/ena/browser/checklists. For data for which there is no disciplinary repository you can use KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr).
